option3.enName: Investments outside of Canada (e.g. warehouse, office, etc.)
option3.frName: des investissements à l’étranger (p. ex. : entrepôt, bureaux).

option4.enName: Customers in Canada who then sell outside of Canada
option4.frName: des clients canadiens qui vendent ensuite à l’étranger.

option5.enName: Business operations are entirely within Canada
option5.frName: des activités commerciales exclusivement au Canada.
